Articles.Content:
Nice to see this updated! I was just working on your request, I'll update it to see if ewverything is still fune (btw sorry it's taking so long, I've been really busy lately. Although I think I should be done by tomorrow )

Thats alright man, life and other things happen.

Anyways, how do you personally feel about the mod?

Thats alright man, life and other things happen.

Anyways, how do you personally feel about the mod?

This has potential. I like the different resources and how you can process them, create fuel, etc. Maybe the engines are a tad bit overpowered (haven't checked if that has been changed in the new update though) but there's a good background idea. I think you should do custom models for the resizes of the RTGs/solar panels/KW parts. Else it's pretty neat ^^
hm, looks like those 2.5m tanks in the new update have weird attach nodes. I can either try to fix them or use those from .08, your call.

hm, looks like those 2.5m tanks in the new update have weird attach nodes. I can either try to fix them or use those from .08, your call.

I'd love some help with those pesky nodes, but don't worry, I'm releasing a new version soon with placeholder tanks (the same ones as the other 4) that work better.

Also, the element Timonium is being renamed Stragneium.
Alright I'll wait until then. Do you still want me to try to fix it or are you gonna dump them?

Alright I'll wait until then. Do you still want me to try to fix it or are you gonna dump them?

I'm going to dump them.

Bump

Rather large update, view first page.

I have feedbacks:

1- NO CFG edits please, if I want a CFG edit I can do it myself, it's an insult to all the other actual mods posted here.

2- NO stupid new resources please. Ever wondered why the stock nuclear rocket burns oxidizer? Because it's stupid annoying when it doesn't.

3- Your battery and impulse drive models look uninspired and generally bad.
Look who's a cranky dude above me. If you don't like it, don't use it. The mod author obviously wants different things from KSP than you do.
That Blutonium-238 tank... Do you have permission to use that model from KW Rocketry?

That Blutonium-238 tank... Do you have permission to use that model from KW Rocketry?

He doesn't use them anymore. Besides he was giving them the credit. for the model and part files.

He doesn't use them anymore. Besides he was giving them the credit. for the model and part files.

I don't see credit... He needs permission, credit or no credit.

I don't see credit... He needs permission, credit or no credit.

The credit was with the file. But as I said, he doesn't use those tanks anymore.
I'm seeing this . . . "Blutonium". Is that some type of resource included in the mod?

Yep for now it's used to create electricity or stragnelium propellant through radioactive decay

(Damn Galacticruler, I'm pretty much your PR guy now xD )
ahhhhh. . . interesting. @_@

I have feedbacks:

1- NO CFG edits please, if I want a CFG edit I can do it myself, it's an insult to all the other actual mods posted here.

2- NO stupid new resources please. Ever wondered why the stock nuclear rocket burns oxidizer? Because it's stupid annoying when it doesn't.

3- Your battery and impulse drive models look uninspired and generally bad.

1. It is not easy to have an orginal idea, just look at Puffin Technologies' Frameshift Drive. (this is made harder by lacking someone who understands unity and can texture.)

2. The new resource is there so I can control the density without altering stock values, and do note they are NOT final.

3. I must refer you to OrbitusII for that negitive feedback.

That Blutonium-238 tank... Do you have permission to use that model from KW Rocketry?

I'm unsure what you mean as I dumped the KW tanks 2 versions ago...
I'm gonna have a whack at the mod myself. . . don't worry I give out constructive criticism.

I'm gonna have a whack at the mod myself. . . don't worry I give out constructive criticism.

Thank you, and I hope you like it.

I might start using the Kethane system to allow mining the two resources.
The mediafire download says the file has been removed, is it up or has something happened?

3. I must refer you to OrbitusII for that negitive feedback.

I actually love those models.

Can't wait for all the parts to be custom, not just cfg edits.

I actually love those models.

Can't wait for all the parts to be custom, not just cfg edits.

I am with you there and I'm currently the only dev on this project....

Glad to see you're getting some real feedback now! I haven't actually been playing KSP lately; other games have caught my interest for now. but i'm keeping my mod collection up to date, and watching this one with interest.

Glad to see you're getting some real feedback now! I haven't actually been playing KSP lately; other games have caught my interest for now. but i'm keeping my mod collection up to date, and watching this one with interest.

Why thankk you kind sir, for those kind words.

I'm afraid that i'm not making much progress lacking a skinner and Unity rigger.

Bump

Read top of first post.
